# SOLUTION
# This is just a simple application of the modulo operation.
# The minimum number of moves will be the difference between
# a and the remainder when a is divided by b.
# Runtime: O(t)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a % b)


import sys

def main():
    t = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    for _ in range(t):
        a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
        print(b - a % b)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
# https://www.codechef.com/problems/FLOW007

# SOLUTION
# This is just a simple application of the modulo operation.
# The minimum number of moves will be the difference between
# a and the remainder when a is divided by b.
# Runtime: O(t)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a % b)

import sys

def main():
    t = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    for _ in range(t):
        a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
        print(b - a % b)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys

def main():
    t = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    for _ in range(t):
        a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
        print(b - a % b if a % b != 0 else 0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
import sys

def main():
    t = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    for _ in range(t):
        a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
        print(b - a % b) 

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
